body:
Here’s some touching music to accompany you as you read:

The Seal Lullaby
Oh! Hush thee, my baby, the night is behind us,
And black are the waters that sparkled so green.
The moon, o’er the combers, looks downward to find us,
At rest in the hollows that rustle between.
Where billow meets billow, then soft be thy pillow,
Oh weary wee flipperling, curl at thy ease!
The storm shall not wake thee, nor shark overtake thee,
Asleep in the arms of the slow swinging seas!
Rudyard Kipling, 1865-1936

Avicus has been through a lot. It’s only a year old and yet has already experienced love, neglect as well of times of rejoice and times of sadness. What has remained true and constant throughout is the dedication and good work of our staff and the community’s devotion to the network. Despite its slippery and somewhat elusive history, there remains a certain cohesion within the apparent disorder. A cohesion that cannot be broken as it is embedded strongly in the collaboration of everyone on Avicus. We have remained strong as an ever changing community of individuals throughout the most difficult of times. I hope to see this continue and only strengthen. “We have come a long way, but not as far as we will go.” Let’s make a difference today!

SO! What’s new on Avicus today? Quite a few things actually!
  • 1.8 Protocol Support
  • Popup Messages
  • Translations (Arabic, German, Pirate Speak, Portuguese, Spanish, Finnish, Dutch). Fix errors or help translate more languages at www.translate.avicus.net
  • /match in Nebula
  • /stats
  • 10 Prestiges ADDED (15 Total)

Play nice with 1.8, it may have bugs. Report any fairly significant issues with these updates at www.github.com/Avicus/Issues/issues as always.

replies.body:
I'd just like to say that I've only been playing on Avicus properly in the last couple of months, but I have already started to love this server and wish to continue playing as long as school doesn't get in the way. It's a shame I probably won't be playing again until 2015 because of my computer blowing up, but I have made so many great friends and this server has already been a great experience for me. We are starting again to strengthen as a server, and I am so happy for this. Now that new prestiges have been added, and I've heard that the lag has been fixed or improved, this will bring in players, especially if people advertise this wonderful community on YouTube. I couldn't have imagined this server any other way, and Avicus is the only thing on Minecraft I play on now xD (and Kohi sometimes). I am so appreciative of the staff on Avicus, and I don't know why people diss IvyCode, he has school, leave him alone, we all do lol. Thanks Ivy for this update, especially lag fixes and 1.8 support. The new /stats is a nice touch, too, and saying "Cyan Team Wins!" or something like that.

Thank you Avicus. I want to be here for a long time :)

iBiZa

Jeez, that took me ages to write xD
